Verses: 1 karththaave, Ennai Niyaayam Visaariyum, Naan En Uththamaththile Nadakkiren; Naan Karththarai Nambiyirukkiren. Aagaiyaal Naan Thallaaduvadhillai.
2 karththaave, Ennaip Pareetchiththu, Ennaich Sodhiththuppaarum; En Ullindhiriyangalaiyum En Irudhayaththaiyum Pudamittuppaarum.
3 ummudaiya Kirubai En Kangalukku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu; Ummudaiya Saththiyaththile Nadandhukollugiren.
4 veenarode Naan Utkaaravillai, Vanjagaridaththil Naan Seruvadhillai.
6 karththaave, Naan Thudhiyin Saththaththaith Dhonikkappanni, Ummudaiya Adhisayangalaiyellaam Vivarippadharkaaga,
7 naan Kutramillaamaiyile En Kaigalaik Kazhuvi, Ummudaiya Peedaththaich Sutrivarugiren.
8 karththaave, Umadhu Aalayamaagiya Vaasasthalaththaiyum, Umadhu Magimai Thangiya Sthaanaththaiyum Vaanjikkiren.
9 en Aaththumaavaip Paavigalodum, En Jeevanai Raththappiriyarodunkooda Vaarikkollaadheyum.
10 avargal Kaigalile Theevinaiyirukkiradhu; Avargal Valadhukai Paridhaanangalaal Niraindhirukkiradhu.
11 naano En Uththamaththile Nadappen; Ennai Meettukkondu Enmel Irakkamaayirum.
12 en Kaal Semmaiyaana Idaththile Nirkiradhu; Sabaigalile Naan Karththaraith Thudhippen.
